ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What a coincidence. I suggested the same thing, lengthening the duration of charm. :-) The change will require an adjustment of socials keys for me,
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:39 PM 5/10/01 -0400, Moss wrote:
> Well, Nerfed again.
>
> Check out
>http://boards.station.sony.com/ubb/everquest/Forum1/HTML/000165.html
>
> I replied that this will really hurt bards. We will lose the services
>of our pets for a short amount of time, will have to charm more (more
>mana) and will take more damage because of pets having to be targeted
>each attack.
>
> I suggested that they consider lengthening the amount of time a
>successful Charm lasts as a way of compensation.. even 5 seconds would
>be helpful...

What a coincidence. I suggested the same thing, lengthening the duration of
charm. :-)

The change will require an adjustment of "socials" keys for me, especially
in a group.

------------

/assist <tank>
/pet attack
/g My pet is attacking %t

---------

For solo kiting, you may need to issue a /pet follow command now as instead
of automatically following like regular pets, they do like to wander off.

While I'm not happy with the change, I do not believe it totally ruins solo
charm kiting. However, it does make it more difficult and you will
definitely take more damage as you try to reacquire your pet's target
before it clobbers you.

---Windleaf
